ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with comicbox 1.1.1 on 2024-03-13T17:17:52 [Issue ID 4000-154690] urn:comicvine:4000-154690 Tagged with ComicTagger 1.6.0a13.dev122 using info from Grand Comics Database on 2024-06-16 04:31:43. [Issue ID 381171]
ComicInfo.Summary: The Eagle, Eisner, and Harvey Award nominated anthology returns this month with yet another issue packed with today's top creators and tomorrow's brightest talents. This issue we welcome Horror novelist STEVE RASNIC TEM with his short story "Erased."
ComicInfo.Title: Jimmy; Rush; Come the Dawn; Spring Love; Aces; All Along I Also Wanted to Become a Doctor; The Demon Head of Harbuu Kisasi; Out Across the Lawn; The Keeper's Carol
ComicInfo.Writer: Doug Wagner,Ron McCain,Jim Dougan,Michel Fiffe,Ron Kasman,James Chambers,Mel Taylor,Doug Wagner,Ron McCain,Jim Dougan,Michel Fiffe,Ron Kasman,James Chambers,Mel Taylor
ComicInfo.Penciller: Rob Haynes,Ron McCain,Hyeondo Park,Michel Fiffe,Shannon Eric Denton,Ron Kasman,R. G. Taylor,Jason Whitley,Rob Haynes,Ron McCain,Hyeondo Park,Michel Fiffe,Shannon Eric Denton,Ron Kasman,R. G. Taylor,Jason Whitley
